Uses of Interface
sunw.demo.encapsulatedEvents.EncapsulatedEventListener

Packages that use EncapsulatedEventListener
sunw.demo.encapsulatedEvents   
 

Uses of EncapsulatedEventListener in sunw.demo.encapsulatedEvents
 

Methods in sunw.demo.encapsulatedEvents with parameters of type EncapsulatedEventListener
 void EncapsulatedEventManager.addEncapsulatedEventListener(java.lang.Object s, EncapsulatedEventListener eel)
           Adds the listener eel to the source s to receive ALL events s emits as encpasulated events.
 void EncapsulatedEventManager.removeEncapsulatedEventListener(java.lang.Object s, EncapsulatedEventListener eel)
           Removes the listener eel from the source s, thus unregistering eel from receiving encapsulated events for all the events that s emits.
 void EncapsulatedEventManager.addEncapsulatedEventListener(java.lang.Object s, EncapsulatedEventListener eel, java.lang.Class[] lc)
           Adds the listener eel to the source s to receive the events enumerated by lc that s emits.
 void EncapsulatedEventManager.removeEncapsulatedEventListener(java.lang.Object s, EncapsulatedEventListener eel, java.lang.Class[] lc)
           Removes the listener eel from the source s, thus unregistering for encapsulated events from s enumerated by lc.
 void EncapsulatedEventAdaptor.addEncapsulatedEventListener(EncapsulatedEventListener el)
           
 void EncapsulatedEventAdaptor.removeEncapsulatedEventListener(EncapsulatedEventListener el)
           
protected  void EncapsulatedEventAdaptor.handleEncapsulatedEventException(EncapsulatedEventException ex, EncapsulatedEventListener eel, java.lang.reflect.Method lm)
           EncapsulatedEventListener's may raise exceptions to the originating event source through an adaptor by throwing the actual exception within an instance of EncapsulatedEventException.
